verses.name: Genesis 18:8
verses.text: And he took butter, and milk, and the calf which he had dressed, and set it before them; and he stood by them under the tree, and they did eat.

verses.name: Genesis 18:9
verses.text: And they said unto him, Where is Sarah thy wife? And he said, Behold, in the tent.

verses.name: Genesis 18:10
verses.text: And he said, I will certainly return unto thee according to the time of life; and, lo, Sarah thy wife shall have a son. And Sarah heard it in the tent door, which was behind him.
